name: 張正春
objective:
本課程之教學目標在使學生瞭解通訊系統的理論基礎及原理。本課程著重於類比系統。課程內容包含：(1) Fourier series and Fourier transform, (2) Signals and linear systems, (3) Linear modulation techniques such, (4) Stochastic process and power spectral density, (6) Modeling of noise and its effects on communication systems

This course introduces the basic theorem and concepts of communication systems, and their applications with emphasis on analog systems. The course covers subjects such as:                (1) Fourier series and Fourier transform, (2) Signals and linear systems, (3) Linear modulation techniques, (4) Stochastic process and power spectral density, (6) Modeling of noise and its effects on communication systems
